items: Clear all personnel to designated viewing area
Set Fuel System to Test-Ready State
Verify FV-02 is CLOSED (Remote Fuel Vent)
Verify FV-03 is CLOSED (Main Fuel Valve)
OPEN NV-02 (Remote Press Iso)
Verify FPD-01 reads between 450 and 500 psia
Verify FPD-02 reads ambient (14-15 psia)
Set Ox System to Test-Ready State
Verify OV-03 is CLOSED (Main Ox Valve)
Verify OPD-01 reads <850 psia
Verify OPD-02 reads ambient (14-15 psia)
Verify EPD-01 reads ambient (14-15 psia)
Clear all personnel to designated viewing area
Set Fuel System to Test-Ready State
Verify FV-02 is CLOSED (Remote Fuel Vent)
Verify FV-03 is CLOSED (Main Fuel Valve)
OPEN NV-02 (Remote Press Iso)
Verify FPD-01 reads between 450 and 500 psia
Verify FPD-02 reads ambient (14-15 psia)
Set Ox System to Test-Ready State
Verify OV-03 is CLOSED (Main Ox Valve)
Verify OPD-01 reads <850 psia
Verify OPD-02 reads ambient (14-15 psia)
Verify EPD-01 reads ambient (14-15 psia)
Install one row of 10-32 bolts for the e-bay
Slide e-bay into upper body tube, in the correct orientation, until it hits the row of bolts
Verify ejection continuity and flight computer signal
Install the second row of 10-32 bolts and ensure e-bay is secure
Pack drogue chute and shock cord into lower part of the upper body tube
Slide upper body tube onto body coupler and install 3 nylon shear pins
Verify ejection continuity and flight computer signal
Pack main chute and shock cord into upper body tube
Slide nose cone onto upper body tube and install 3 nylon shear pins
